manifest.author: ioannisxirouxakis
manifest.changelog:
-Improved the blur while expanding profile pictures of profiles, making them way better than before.
-Fixed the bugged circle in the search in direct.
-You can now share the music you're currently listening to on Spotify to a music note in Instagram (haven't tested it as I do not use Spotify, feel free to give me feedback).
-Redesigned the search button and it's behaviour in the sharing sheet.
-Enabled the profile card for profiles (the card that shows information about the profile when you want to share it to someone).
-Minor changes and fixes.
manifest.name: ioannisxir's Instafel Backup
manifest.description: Yeah, most popular backup in the world!
